actions.name: Absorbing Down

cost.trigger: The user gains a positive DEF Stage from an effect.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user gains a positive DEF Stage from an effect.

Effect: The triggering effect's duration increases by 2.

actions.name: Absorbing Down
actions.description: Passive: The user ignores negative DEF Stages.
